snippet: Airbnb Neighborhoods allows users to sort vacation rentals by filters like "Trendy," "Great Transit" and "Artsy" in seven cities.
abstract: Airbnb Neighborhoods allows users to sort vacation rentals by filters like "Trendy," "Great Transit" and "Artsy" in seven cities.

headline.main: Airbnb Adds ‘Experience’ As a Rental Filter Choice
headline.print_headline: Airbnb Adds ‘Experience’ As a Rental Filter Choice
